whyHasItMade: If you have even once drawn up literary references in a term paper, you remember what a pain in the ass it is. This is the main reason for the appearance of this application.
whatCanYouDo: You can create document types (book, article, online source) with your own fields, such as date or volume. Then, for each type, you create a format in which you need to arrange the sources. The next step is the easiest - search and add sources. Then the application will do everything for you.
ourWhishes: We hope to be able to add default types and formats so you don't have to do it yourself. But while everything is in development, wait.
